original: Mahāparinirvāṇasūtra (2nd)
analyzed: mahāparinirvāṇasūtra

original: Wal_1 vitarkā viditā utpadyaṁte viditās tiṣṭaṁti viditā adhyastaṁgacchaṁti /
analyzed: vitarkāḥ vid utpadyate vid tiṣṭati vid adhyastagacchati

original: Wal_2 idam api yūyam ānanda tathāgatasyāścaryādbhutadharmaṁ dhārayata / evam āścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ānanda tathāgataḥ /
analyzed: idam api yūyam ānanda tathāgatasya āścarya adbhuta dharma dhārayata evam āścarya adbhuta dharma samanvāgataḥ ānanda tathāgataḥ

original: Wal_3 atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa / āgamayānanda yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramiṣyāvaḥ /
analyzed: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmatrayāmāsa āgamaya ānanda yena gandhamādana caitya tena upasakramiṣyāvaḥ

original: Wal_4 evaṁ bhadaṁta āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
analyzed: eva bhadata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt

original: Wal_5 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / āyuṣmān ānando niṣīdanam aṁsenāropya bhagavaṁtaṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ  #
analyzed: atha bhagavān utthāya āsanāt yena gandhamādana caitya tena upasakramati āyuṣmān ānandaḥ niṣīdanam bhagavata pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas

original: samanubaddhaḥ … myānulomatayā /
analyzed: samanubaddhaḥ

original: Wal_6 atha bhagavāṁ gandhamādanaṁ caityam abhyavagāhya yenānyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / upasaṁkramya āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa
analyzed: atha bhagavān gandhamādana caityam abhyavagāhya yena anyatama vṛkṣa mūla tena upasakramati upasakramyaḥ āyuṣmatam ānandam āmatrayāmāsa

original: Wal_7 prajñapayānandāsmiṁ vṛkṣamūle tathāgatasya niṣīdanaṁ pṛṣṭhī me āglāyati tāṁ tāvad āyāmayiṣye /
analyzed: prajñapaya ānanda asmi vṛkṣa mūle tathāgatasya niṣīdana pṛṣṭhī me āglāyati tā tāvat āyāmayiṣye

original: Wal_8 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tasmiṁ vṛkṣamūle bhagavato niṣīdanaṁ prajñapayāmāsa /
analyzed: eva bhadata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tasmin vṛkṣa mūle bhagavataḥ niṣīdana prajñapayāmāsa

original: Wal_9 nyaṣīdad bhagavāṁ prajñapta evāsane /āyuṣmān apy ānando bhagavata ekāṁte nyaṣīdat /
analyzed: nyaṣīdat bhagavā prajñapte eva āsane āyuṣmān api ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ ekāte nyaṣīdat

original: Wal_10 niṣadya bhagavāṁ āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmantrayāmāsa /
analyzed: niṣadya bhagavān āyuṣmatam ānandam āmantrayāmāsa

original: Wal_11 yāvaṁta ānanda bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ caityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātaya /
analyzed: yāvataḥ ānanda bhikṣavaḥ gandhamādana caityam upaniḥśṛtya viharati tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyā sanipātaya

original: Wal_12 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānanda bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvaṁto bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ
analyzed: eva bhadata āyuṣmān ānanda bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvataḥ bhikṣavaḥ gandhamādana

original: caityam upaniḥṣṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātayāmāsa / saṁnipātya
analyzed: caityam upaniḥṣṭhatya viharati tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyā sanipātayāmāsa sanipātya

original: śirasā bhagavataḥ pādau vaṁttvaikānte asthāt /
analyzed: śirasā bhagavataḥ pādau vattvā ekānte asthāt

original: Wal_13 ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavaṁtam idam avocat /
analyzed: ekānta sthitaḥ āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavatam idam avocat

original: Wal_14 yāvaṁto bhadanta bhikṣavo gandhamādanacaityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipatitāḥ / yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ  #
analyzed: yāvataḥ bhadanta bhikṣavaḥ gandhamādana caityam upaniḥśṛtya viharati sarve te upasthānaśālāyā sa nipatitāḥ yasya idānī bhagavān kāla

original: manyate /
analyzed: manyate

original: Wal_15 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yenopasthānaśālā tenopasaṁkrānta upasaṁkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
analyzed: atha bhagavān utthāya āsanāt yena upasthānaśālā tena upasakrāntaḥ upasakramya prajñapte eva āsane nyaṣīdat

original: Wal_16 niṣaṇṇo bhagavāṁ bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayāmāsa /
analyzed: niṣaṇṇaḥ bhagavān bhikṣūn āmatrayāmāsa

original: Wal_17 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmāḥ svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṁpadya praveditās
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ye mayā dharmāḥ svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvā upasapadya praveditāḥ

original: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāro ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
analyzed: tat yathā catvāri smṛti upasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāraḥ ṛddhipādāḥ pañca indriyāṇi

original: pañca balāni sapta bodhyṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ tatra vaḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ
analyzed: pañca balāni sapta bodhyṅgāni ārya aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mārgaḥ tatra vaḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ

original: saṁmodamānair avivadadbhir ekāgrair ekoddeśair ekakṣīrodakabhūtaiḥ … dīpayamānaiḥ
analyzed: samodamānaiḥ a vivadadbhiḥ ekāgraiḥ eka uddeśaiḥ eka kṣīra udaka bhūtaiḥ dīpayamānaiḥ

original: sukhasparśaṁ vihartavyam /
analyzed: sukha sparśa vihartavyam

original: Wal_18 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmā ākhyātās tadyathā sūtraṁ geyaṁ vyākaraṇaṁ gāthodānā
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ye mayā dharmāḥ ākhyātāḥ tat yathā

original: nidānāvadānā itivṛttakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśās te dharmā bhavadbhiḥ sādhu
analyzed: nidāna avadānāḥ iti vṛttaka jātaka vaipulya adbhuta dharma upadeśāḥ te dharmāḥ bhavadbhiḥ sādhu

original: ca suṣṭhu codgrahītavyā udgṛhya dhārayitavyā dhārayitvā tulayitavyāḥ tulayitvā niśāmayitavyā
analyzed: ca suṣṭhu ca udgrahītavyāḥ udgṛhya dhārayitavyāḥ dhārayitvā tulayitavyāḥ tulayitvā niśāmayitavyā

original: niśāmya tathā tathā pratipattavyam /
analyzed: niśāmya tathā tathā pratipattavyam

original: Wal_19 tat kasmād dhetoḥ / acireṇa tathāgatasya parinirvāṇaṁ bhaviṣyati / trayāṇāṁ māsānām
analyzed: tat kasmāt hetoḥ acireṇa tathāgatasya parinirvāṇa bhaviṣyati trayāṇām māsānām

original: atyayena tathāgatasya parinirvāṇaṁ bhaviṣyati kuśinagaryupavartane mallānāṁ sālavane
analyzed: atyayena tathāgatasya parinirvāṇa bhaviṣyati kuśinagarī upavartane sāla vane

original: antare yamakasālayoḥ /
analyzed: antare yamaka sālayoḥ

original: Wal_20 atha te bhikṣavo bhagavatontikād idaṁ evaṁrūpaṁ vākyaṁ śrutvā ekatyā bhikṣavaḥ cchinnaprapāta … pṛthivyāṁ nipetuś cetobh samarpitāḥ atikṣipraṁ
analyzed: atha te bhikṣavaḥ bhagavataḥ untikāt idam evarūpa vākya śrutvā ekatyāḥ bhikṣavaḥ chinna prapāta pṛthivyāḥ nipetuḥ cetobh samarpitāḥ ati kṣipra
